name: Dungeon Dicelords
description:
Hey! This is an early-ish prototype of a thing I'm calling Dungeon Dicelords.

Manipulate dice and abilities in the vein of something like Dicey Dungeons except  it's party based.

Controls with the mouse . Left mouse interacts with most things and you only use the

right mouse button to dismiss an active ability window.

I'm sure it's broken in a lot of ways and there is basically no balancing.
Thanks for trying it out and let me know what you think i should or shouldn't do with this.

V is also used as a key to quickly restart.
